text.text_translated:
Sometimes a bridge falls down.
At first, people do not know why.
Engineers must do a complete study to find the reason.
Sometimes, the materials in the bridge were bad.
Or an important part had a problem from the beginning.
In other cases, a bridge can only hold a certain weight.
It cannot hold more weight than that.
